contents.item: Celebrating people is a form of love
Everything you have was bought with the currency of time
Don’t equate effective living to being busy
The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
contents.owner: Aaron Lauritsen, 100 Days Drive: The Great North American Road Trip

contents.item: When you celebrate a person, you are celebrating the creator of that person
Always live in active consciousness
We should be blessings to others as believers
Every fragment of time that passes daily must be converted for it to be fully effective
Life is all about discovery
Joblessness sets you free psychologically
Service to God is largely unacceptable without service to men
The effectiveness of your life is determined by your ability to convert your time into values
Life should be an investment in yourself
Survival isn’t all there is to life
We celebrate God when we share in each other’s joy and pain
Joblessness brings you face to face with destiny
Gain great values by converting your time
Fulfilling purpose is the major key to being productive in life
Those with traditional sense will follow what their heart tells them is right.
contents.owner: Fennel Hudson, Traditional Angling - Fennel's Journal - No. 6

contents.item: Always appreciate the good in people
An effective life is not determined by how long you lived
Man’s inner content is the worth of his life
All products come from the worth of time
Work is a means to fulfill your heavenly mandate
Nothing is possible without time
Celebrate God daily by celebrating His creation
Life is given to be invested in multiplying
Our fellowship is with God and His people
See the light in losing your employment
The effectiveness of your life is determined by how much impact you make
Life is about fruitfulness
You have to discover your area of talent to be effective
You can only build yourself effectively in the area of your calling
You need to live a life of service to make your life an effective one
Your calling is whatever motivates you more than money
Don’t waste time on employment, discover yourself today
Money does not determine our worth
Our attitude to others dictate God’s attitude to us
Employment is a vicious cycle
We love our partners for who they are, not for who they are not.
contents.owner: Aaron Lauritsen, 100 Days Drive: The Great North American Road Trip

contents.item: No amount of money can recover lost time
An effective life is a selfless one
Don’t exert all your energy on employment, locate your purpose
Our target as believers is to live an effective life, not just a long one
Until you believe in yourself, it does not matter how much you believe in God
Your Core Values are the "glue" that holds your business together.
Our service as believers is not complete without fellowship with people
Don’t neglect your calling all in the name of employment
There is no limitation in God
Love is the primary nature of God
An effective life is a life of purpose
Purpose is the most important thing worth living for
Do not restrain yourself from fellowshipping with people, regardless of their age or status
Our fellowship is with God when we have mutual fellowship with one another
Love others the way God loves you
Building bridges is the best defence against ignorance.
contents.owner: Aaron Lauritsen, 100 Days Drive: The Great North American Road Trip

contents.item: Your calling is concealed in you and has to be discovered by you alone
Always put your heart into and show commitment in whatever you do
Glorifying people is the most noble act
Being married or having children does not mean you are living an effective life
The purpose of life is fulfilling the essence of your creation
The only way to practicalize your love for God is by helping and loving others
Be strategic and purposeful in whatever you do
You are at liberty to develop yourself when you are self employed
The highway of grace will get you somewhere a whole lot faster then the freeway of spite.
Effectiveness of life is not in self aggrandising
You have to be skillful in your time management to be productive
The effectiveness of your life is not determined by the duration of your life
Being rich or famous does not equate an effective life
Uplifting God’s Kingdom on earth should be our life’s mandate as believers
Your relationship with God is tested by your relationship with His people
You can only reach God through His creation
The concept of work should be understood diligently
Don’t go in the opposite direction, locate your calling
You cannot fellowship with God when you disqualify another person from fellowshipping with you
We cannot glorify God when we refuse to celebrate others
Work is not about survival alone
Discovering yourself is the major key to being successful
Your calling is your natural area of concentration
Invest your time and add value to your life because that is the only way to greatness.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

contents.item: We are all equal in the sight of the creator
Don’t fellowship with people around you alone, explore and reach out to more people
No amount of service we do can impress God, only our service to ordinary people can
Life is supposed to be used in fulfilling our individual purposes of creation
Your calling should be your work
You are moving in the opposite direction when your life is about survival only
Work is an instrument through which you build yourself
We are capable of anything and everything
You can discover your calling through the eyes of others
Losing your job brings you closer to your destiny
